original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.35. Āsavasāsavadukādi, Kusalattika🔽Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  āsavasāsavaduka ādi kusalattika  sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca akusalam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
